title: Online Mathematics Project-Based Learning Design Using AI Chatbots

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Smartphone-centric limited technological environment, enhanced formative assessment, real-time interaction support via AI chatbots.

learning_goals: Perform real-time question-and-answer interactions with AI chatbots at a frequency of at least 80%
Revise problem-solving strategies at least three times using AI chatbot feedback during project execution
Maintain collaboration frequency with peer learners (at least twice weekly) in AI chatbot-supported environments, achieving at least 50% higher engagement than in face-to-face classes
Achieve an average score of at least 85 points in monthly formative assessments for project completion and concept application

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
